title: Rockstar Virtual Assistant (with bookkeeping + Automation skills)
job_overview:
???? Key Responsibilities
Bookkeeping: Assist with daily transaction recording, reconciliations, invoicing, expense tracking, and light financial reporting

CRM Management: Manage pipelines and client communications in Go High Level and other CRMs

Automation: Set up and maintain automations/workflows for emails, client onboarding, and lead follow-up

Social Media Management: Schedule and manage posts, engage with followers, and help grow our brand

Funnel Building: Assist in creating and optimizing sales funnels (landing pages, lead magnets, follow-up sequences)
 
Email Management: Organize and respond to emails, flag priorities, and maintain inbox sanity

Content Creation: Assist with captions, newsletters, lead magnets, and occasional blog or website updates

Project & Task Organization: Keep projects on track

???? Must-Have Skills & Experience
2+ years of virtual assistant or administrative experience

Working knowledge of QuickBooks Online or other bookkeeping software

Go High Level CRM experience (or ability to learn fast!)

Strong understanding of automation tools (Zapier, GHL workflows, etc.)

Comfortable creating simple social media graphics in Canva or similar

Excellent written and verbal communication

Obsessed with details, deadlines, and follow-through

???? Bonus Points If You:
Have experience in the tax, finance, or coaching industry

Have built or managed funnels before (LeadPages, GHL, ClickFunnels, etc.)

Are familiar with AI tools for content or workflow optimization

???? What We Offer:
Flexible, remote work environment

Room to grow with a fast-scaling company

Meaningful work supporting entrepreneurs and small businesses

Occasional bonuses and team incentives

???? How to Apply:
Respond to this post with your resume, a short video or voice note (optional) telling us why you’re the right fit, and at least one example of your work (content, funnel, automation setup, or other relevant sample) to Upgrade to see actual info Line: “Your Next Rockstar VA – [Your Name]”
